IntakeFormSection.name: IntakeFormSection
IntakeFormSection.description: Represents a section of an intake form such as a job application, a complaint, or a referral.

ApplicationStageDefinitionId.description: The application stage definition associated with the intake form section.

Description.description: The description of the intake form section.

DueDate.description: The date when the intake form section must be completed.

EndDateTime.description: The end date and time of the intake form section.

IsRequired.description: Specifies whether the intake form section is required (true) or not (false).

IsSubmitted.description: Specifies whether the intake form section is submitted (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the intake form section.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the record owner.

PreliminaryApplicationRefId.description: The ID of the preliminary application reference associated with the intake form section.

ReferenceRecordId.description: The ID of the record that the intake form section is associated with.

SavedApplicationUrl.description: The URL of the saved application that's associated with the intake form section.

SequenceNumber.description: The sequence number for the intake form section.

StartDateTime.description: The start date and time of the intake form section.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the intake form section.

Type.description: The type of the intake form section.
